DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to determine the level of knowledge and skills to recognize and decompression of tension pneumothorax
DOC.brief_title: Are EMS Personnel Prepared to Identify and Decompression of Tension Pneumothorax
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study maximum 1 year of work experience in medicine paramedics, nurses, physicians not meet the above criteria wrist or low back diseases pregnancy
